32#ifndef _LINUX_MODULEPARAM_H_
33#define _LINUX_MODULEPARAM_H_
34
35#include <sys/types.h>
36
37struct linux_module_param_info {
38 const char *dname; // Name used for description
39 const char *name; // Name for sysctl
40 void *ptr; // Pointer to variable value
41 int type; // MTYPE_
42 mode_t mode; // 600 (rw) or 400 (r)
43};
44
45#define MTYPE_int 0
46#define MTYPE_bool 1
47#define MTYPE_charp 2
48#define MTYPE_uint 3
49
50#define module_param_named(NAME, VAR, TYPE, MODE) \
51static __attribute__((__used__)) struct linux_module_param_info info_ ## NAME = { \
52 .dname = # NAME, \
53 .name = # VAR, \
54 .ptr = & VAR, \
55 .type = MTYPE_ ## TYPE, \
56 .mode = MODE, \
57}; \
58__link_set_add_data(linux_module_param_info, info_ ## NAME)
59
60#define module_param(VAR, TYPE, MODE) module_param_named(VAR, VAR, TYPE, MODE)
61#define module_param_unsafe module_param
62#define module_param_named_unsafe module_param_named
63
64#endif /* _LINUX_MODULEPARAM_H_ */
65
